entries.title: Who is Andrew Tate, ‘king of toxic masculinity’ accused of trafficking?
entries.description: Andrew Tate, who made news for a tweet to Greta Thunberg, has been dubbed “the scariest man on the Internet” by critics and “the king of toxic masculinity” by fans.

entries.title: Five fun party games to ring in the new year remotely
entries.description: From JackBox to Overcooked, here are some of the best multiplayer games that can be played over your phone or computer.

entries.title: Ads took over shopping in 2022. It’s now harder to trust what you buy.
entries.description: More online and real-world stores make extra money to steer you to buy one brand of TV set or toothpaste over another. Is this good for you?

entries.title: Andrew Tate, brother charged in Romania with human trafficking
entries.description: Romanian prosecutors are seeking to hold Tate, self-described misogynist, and brother Tristan for up to 30 days. One alleged victim was American.

entries.title: This doctor prescribes ketamine to thousands online. It’s all legal.
entries.description: A federal waiver helped give rise to a new industry treating depression with the psychedelic drug ketamine by telemedicine. Now the controversial approach faces an uncertain future.
